mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Jane C. Washington to John Augustine Washington III, 1837 January 20
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, Jane Charlotte Blackburn, 1786-1855
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Jane C .Washington writes to her son John A. Washington III that she is at Mount Vernon settling accounts. She discusses family news and difficulties with postage. She makes a special request to send the 'Plaid Linen' with Uncle Bushrod should he pay a visit to Blakeley. Autograph letter signed, 1 page with partial seal.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: John Augustine Washington III and Descendants Papers
